data.title: 2024 Olivier Awards: Full list of winners
data.meta_description: Hannah Waddingham hosted the 2024 Olivier Awards at the Royal Albert Hall. Jamie Lloyd's *Sunset Boulevard* was the night's biggest winner, and took home seven awards. Read more on LondonTheatre.co.uk.
data.text:
Find out the full list of winners at the 2024 Olivier Awards with London Theatre. The ceremony took place at the Royal Albert Hall on 14 April.

Jamie Lloyd's Sunset Boulevard won big on the night, with seven awards including Best Actress in a Musical for Nicole Scherzinger for her turn as Norma Desmond, Best Director for Jamie Lloyd, and Best Musical Revival.

Dear England, Operation Mincemeat, and Stranger Things: The First Shadow all won two awards each.

Sarah Snook scooped Best Actress for her performance in The Picture of Dorian Gray, while Mark Gatiss took home the Olivier Award for Best Actor for The Motive and the Cue.

There was also a posthumous recognition for Haydn Gwynne's performance in When Winston Went to War with the Wireless. The actress passed away aged 66 in October 2023.
